title.narrative: Tonga Health Systems Support Program II

description.narrative: The Tonga Health Systems Support Program Phase 2 (THSSP 2) is designed to support the Government of Tonga’s (GOT) own strategy and planning for the health sector by providing support to its Ministry of Health to improve health service delivery, with a strong focus on non-communicable diseases (NCDs). The program’s assistance continues to align to the MOH Corporate Plan 2015-2020 and the Tonga Strategic Development Framework II. The Program’s work around NCDs will be aligned to the National Strategy to Prevent and Control NCDs 2010 – 2015. The THSSP 2’s overarching objective is for a more effective, efficient and equitable preventative and primary care service for the Tongan population. This would be achieved through addressing three main areas of reducing the prevalence of NCD risk factors; strengthening health system strengthening and increasing equity of access to health services.
